DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare two different technique place dental implant : 1 ) remove tooth place implant immediately 2 ) remove tooth place implant temporary crown immediately . Both procedure currently accept method replace miss teeth direct comparison two procedure lack . The result study aid clinician select best implant placement technique patient .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Immediate Implant Placement Provisionalization Esthetic Zone
DOC.detailed_description: To qualify , patient must 18 79 year old , good health , tooth upper jaw ( except molar ) need extract , able willing return University Michigan Dental School follow-up appointment ( 8 follow-up visit period 12 month ) . Sufficient number natural teeth and/or replacement provide stable occlusion determine investigator Patients exclude follow condition : Women pregnant plan become pregnant , exist implant adjacent area study , current smoker quit smoke less one year ago , antibiotic therapy two week within 3 month baseline , need antibiotic prior dental treatment ( due prosthetic joint replacement medical condition ) , chronic use medication know affect gum tissue ( calcium channel blocker ( le 6 month , 6 month experience overgrowth gum ) , anticonvulsant , immunosuppressive drug , nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory medication ... ) , current orthodontic treatment , active periodontal treatment . Participants must inform investigator enrolled study may becloud participation study .
DOC.criteria: 18 79 year old good health single tooth upper jaw ( except molar ) need extracted able willing return University Michigan Dental School followup appointment ( 8 followup visit period 12 month ) Sufficient number natural teeth and/or replacement provide stable occlusion determine investigator exist implant adjacent area study current smoker quit smoke less one year ago antibiotic therapy two week within 3 month baseline , need antibiotic prior dental treatment ( due prosthetic joint replacement medical condition ) chronic use medication know affect gum tissue ( calcium channel blocker ( le 6 month , 6 month experience overgrowth gum ) , anticonvulsant , immunosuppressive drug , nonsteroidal antiinflammatory medication ... ) current orthodontic treatment , active periodontal treatment Women pregnant plan become pregnant course study , nurse mother unstable medical condition unable routine dental surgery participate study . If already participate another study , ask inform investigator participate one study may harmful .
